  <title>GLiM.shp</title>
  <abstract>Shapefile belonging to the paper "LamaH | Large-Sample Data for Hydrology and Environmental Sciences for Central Europe", submitted to the journal ESSD (Earth System Science Data) in March 2021.

The features in this shapefile show the intersecting and reprojected polygons from the GLiM dataset (Hartmann and Moosdorf, 2012).

Attributes:
"OBJECTID" - unique identifier within GLiM
"IDENTITY_" ID of original polygon
"Litho" - 6-digit code for lithology, xxyyzz, first level (xx), second level (yy), third level (zz), see Hartmann and Moosdorf (2012) for further description
"xx" - first level (xx), see Hartmann and Moosdorf (2012) for further description

References:
Hartmann, J. and Moosdorf, N.: The new global lithological map database GLiM: A representation of rock properties at the Earth surface, Geochem. Geophy. Geosy., 13, 1â€“37, https://doi.org/10.1029/2012GC004370, 2012.

Downloaded original GIS data from: 
https://www.dropbox.com/s/9vuowtebp9f1iud/LiMW_GIS%202015.gdb.zip?dl=0</abstract>
